Option: general.error_log

This option enables you to turn on/off error logging if this option is set to a file or file path logging will be enabled if it's set to a empty string it will be disabled. This option is disabled by default.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['general.error_log'] = "errors.log";
